title: Tex-Mex Meatballs
directions: In a medium bowl, combine ground beef, 1 cup of cheese, bread crumbs, parsley, garlic, jalapeño, egg, and cumin and season with salt and pepper. Mix until
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil. Add meatballs in a single layer and sear 2 minutes per
Add onion to skillet and cook, stirring, until soft, 5 minutes. Stir in crushed tomatoes and chipotle in
adobo and bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat to
medium-low and return meatballs to skillet. Cover and
simmer until meatballs are cooked through, about
Top with remaining 1 cup cheese, then cover with lid to let melt, about 2 minutes.
ingredients: freshly chopped parsley, plus more for garnish
chopped chipotle chiles in adobo sauce
